name: The Wizard's Tower (itch) (clairross)
description:
Welcome to The Wizard's Tower. Now get out. 

Be careful, things aren't always what they seem.

=============================

My roommate and I haven't completed a Unity game before, and decided to make this while still working full-time jobs and being a day late to start, but are both proud of what we got out in under 30 man-hours. We plan on building off of this in the future, so if you like the base concept, leave a comment.

=============================

*(KINDA) SPOILER* PLAY ONCE BEFORE READING

Note: The lava, poison, and plasma do damage until you have moved around enough. We ran out of time to add animations for that.
